original_title: 本当にあった怨霊恐怖動画 4
overview: The 4th horror documentary released by the staff of "Real Horror Ghost Video" series. Includes all 10 posted videos that director Junpei Tsuchida has lifted the ban on to death. Here is the most terrifying message from an evil spirit who left this world with a strong grudge.
tagline: Super and most terrifying message from evil spirits posted by the general public!
title: Real Vengeful Ghost Horror Video 4
